videos.title: It Doesn't Get More Bend Than This - Bend Dirt Fest, July 12th
videos.description:
Scarborough Bicycle Accident Law presents the 1st Annual Bend Dirt Fest – Saturday, July 12th.

Bend Dirt Fest is the multi-discipline race for everyone. Riders and Runners choose one of three options: a half marathon trail run, a 54 mile gravel grinder, or a 36 mile mountain bike course. Solo participants complete simultaneously and are scored based on their own times. You can also be a part of a 2 or 3 person team, add your times together, and complete against other teams! There’ll be live music, ice cold beer from 10 Barrel, plus vendors showing off the latest in gear, apparel, and crafts. So bring the family and friends to Bend Dirt Fest and enjoy everything that makes Bend and Central Oregon special! Visit benddirtfest.com for more information and to register.

videos.title: Bike Film Festival 2022
videos.description:
A short video produced by Dirty Freehub shown at the May 2022 Bicycle Film Festival - Bend.

Dirty Freehub is a 501(c)3 non-profit dedicated to the mission of connecting gravel cyclists to where they ride. Connecting them to ... culture, history, people, places and lands. We are fueled by your generous donations.
https://dirtyfreehub.org
